data.title: Matt LeBlanc Is Single Again
data.meta_description: Matt LeBlanc is back on the market after splitting with his longtime girlfriend.
data.text:
ADVERTISEMENT

Brace yourself for a big ol' "How you doin'?" Matt LeBlanc is single after splitting with longtime girlfriend Andrea Anders.

The couple are said to have broken up several months ago, People reports. They dated for eight years after meeting on the set of Joey, his Friends spinoff. A rep for the 47-year-old actor denied rumors of infidelity back in November.

LeBlanc, who has a 10-year-old daughter from his marriage to Melissa McKnight, has been living in London and filming Episodes. Anders, meanwhile, recently guested on Modern Family.

Any interested parties who fancy meatball subs, fake foreskins, and guys who go commando should get in touch. You know you want to...

Like this post? There's more. Get tons of celeb goodness, insider intel, movie and TV news, and more on the Refinery29 Entertainment Facebook page!
